name: Winky Blinky
overview: Is Mister Turpin blinking? Or is he winking at you? Can you stay focused on the task at hand and answer quickly enough? Test your reaction skills in this silly little game! Connect your joystick to port 2. Press fire to start, and move your joystick left when there's a wink, right when there's a blink. Credits Programming and graphics by Roy Fielding Sound and graphics by Vanja Utne
